summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V046000 (AIR BAGS) REGARDING THE PASSENGER SIDE FRONTAL AIR BAG INFLATOR. THE CONTACT CALLED APPLE FORD IN RED LION AT 717-244-7677 (3250 CAPE HORN RD, RED LION, PA 17356) WHERE IT WAS CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND WAS NOT ABLE TO CONFIRM WHEN THE PARTS WERE TO BECOME AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED THAT THE DRIVER'S SIDE AIR BAG COULD ALSO BE DEFECTIVE AND WANTED IT REPLACED AS WELL. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. ... *BF  *TR *DT  CONSUMER STATED HOUSING AROUND THE METAL DEVICE THAT MAKES THE AIR BAG WORK IS DEFECTIVE.   'PARTS OF THIS DOCUMENT HAVE BEEN REDACTED TO PROTECT PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).'    UPDATED 12/12/18*JB
